channel.title: Gadgets on Jesse Builds Software
channel.description: Recent content in Gadgets on Jesse Builds Software

item.title: My Experience with the Dvorak Keyboard Layout
item.description: I’ve been happily using the Dvorak keyboard layout for more than 25 years. I switched because I thought typing faster would be a benefit in my career. I can type faster, and it also reduces the strain on my wrists. It does have some drawbacks though. If you had asked me before writing this post I would have told you that I love it, but now I’m not so sure.

item.title: Changing From an iPod to a Creative Zen
item.description: The time finally came for me to replace my iPod with something new. I was using aniPod click wheelthat I got as a warranty replacement back in 2004.It was good to me, but I felt that it was time to look at other options.If iTunes ran a little better on my PC, I probably would have just bought another iPod without a second thought. Hardware It took me quite a while to choose a new device.
